## Public Member Functions

### manifest() {#a0d98269355808991256aba588512be74}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ChangeStatus anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AANonConvergentFunction::manifest (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Hook for the Attributor to trigger the manifestation of the information represented by the abstract attribute in the LLVM-IR.

\\Return CHANGED if the IR was altered, otherwise UNCHANGED.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02933">2933</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.

### trackStatistics() {#a8cef751f16129d0ebb9794b126aa3524}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;AttributorAttributes.cpp&#125;::AANonConvergentFunction::trackStatistics () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Hook to enable custom statistic tracking, called after manifest that resulted in a change if statistics are enabled.

We require subclasses to provide an implementation so we remember to add statistics for them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp/#l02942">2942</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/attributorattributes-cpp">AttributorAttributes.cpp</a>.
